response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is worth more than $1,200,000 to you. My initial offer for this exceptional item is $1,400,000. I understand the value this product holds for you and I am confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working with you on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 1400000}
